'''"The Poetry of Song and Dreams"''' is a [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

It can be obtained from reaching [[Vanarana's Favor]] level 50.

Interacting with the tree by choosing "Touch Lightly" causes the trunk to glow, spots of lights to appear, and leaves to fall gently.
